brandInfo.name: Bonji
brandInfo.tagline: Anti-Pollution Skin & Hair Care Products Backed by Science
brandInfo.brandMission: Create science-backed skincare and haircare products designed to address the root causes of issues like pollution, hard water, UV exposure, and stress—common in urban Indian lifestyles
brandValues: Solutions for Indian urban lifestyle challenges
brandInfo.socialProof: Trusted by urban Indians dealing with pollution and hard water issues

products.name: Milk Thistle & Vitamin B-12 Face Serum
products.shortDescription: A fast-absorbing antioxidant serum with Milk Thistle and Vitamin B12 that calms inflammation, hydrates deeply, and repairs the skin barrier.
products.detailedDescription: Perfect for sensitive, pollution-stressed skin dealing with redness, dullness, uneven tone, or early signs of aging. Feels like a lightweight, milky-serum that is non-sticky and quick-absorbing.
keyBenefits: Hydrates deeply and repairs skin barrier
Reduces dullness and uneven skin tone
Helps with fine lines and early aging signs
howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops to a clean, damp face.
Use morning and night for best results.

customerReviews.featuredReview: I absolutelyy loved it, I have tried manyy many serums, but they dry out my face, but this one hydrates it so well i dont use a moisturizer anymore, in a week i saw dark spots fading, it smoothens my skin.

products.name: Advanced Scalp Clarifying Shampoo
products.shortDescription: A detoxifying shampoo that combines Activated Charcoal and Green Tea Extract to deeply cleanse, rebalance, and refresh the scalp.
products.detailedDescription: This detoxifying shampoo combines Activated Charcoal and Green Tea Extract to deeply cleanse, rebalance, and refresh the scalp. Its silky black gel texture creates a mild lather that removes buildup without over-drying, leaving the scalp clean, balanced, and ready for healthy hair growth. Feels like a silky black gel with a mild lather that leaves your scalp feeling clear & balanced.
howToUse: Apply an adequate amount of shampoo and massage gently into a mild lather.
Leave on for 1-2 minutes to allow the actives to work.
Follow with a conditioner if needed, focusing on lengths and ends.

customerReviews.featuredReview: Excellent for cleaning product build-up . Foaming can be a bit better though.

products.name: Scalp Soothing Hair Oil (50 ml)
products.shortDescription: A scalp-soothing hair oil that combines the anti-dandruff power of Tea Tree Oil with the cooling relief of Peppermint Oil to reduce itching, dryness, and flakiness.
products.detailedDescription: Its lightweight, non-greasy formula absorbs quickly, leaving the scalp refreshed, soothed, and dandruff-free. Works like magic with consistent use.
keyBenefits: Combats dryness from pollution or hard water
Helps with oily scalp microbial imbalance
howToUse: Leave on for at least 2 hours or overnight.

customerReviews.featuredReview: Amazing product have been using for around a month now and my hair feels less itchy and dandruff also reduced.

products.name: Scalp Soothing Hair Oil (100 ml)
products.shortDescription: A scalp-soothing hair oil that combines the anti-dandruff power of Tea Tree Oil with the cooling relief of Peppermint Oil to reduce itching, dryness, and flakiness.
products.detailedDescription: Its lightweight, non-greasy formula absorbs quickly, leaving the scalp refreshed, soothed, and dandruff-free. Works like magic with consistent use. 100ml value size.
keyBenefits: Combats dryness from pollution or hard water
Helps with oily scalp microbial imbalance
howToUse: Leave on for at least 2 hours or overnight.

customerReviews.featuredReview: Amazing product have been using for around a month now and my hair feels less itchy and dandruff also reduced.

products.name: Scalp Nourishing Hair Oil (50 ml)
products.shortDescription: A nourishing hair oil that blends Rosemary and Kalonji Seed Oil to help prevent hair fall, boost regrowth, and repair damage from pollution and hard water.
products.detailedDescription: Its lightweight, non-greasy texture cushions the scalp while nourishing from root to tip for stronger, healthier hair.
keyBenefits: Helps with hair thinning & hair fall
howToUse: Apply directly to the scalp and hair strands.
Leave on for at least 2 hours or overnight for deep nourishment.

customerReviews.featuredReview: It really lives up to its name, my scalp feels nourished and my hair fall reduced in just 2 weeks!

products.name: Scalp Nourishing Hair Oil (100 ml)
products.shortDescription: A nourishing hair oil that blends Rosemary and Kalonji Seed Oil to help prevent hair fall, boost regrowth, and repair damage from pollution and hard water.
products.detailedDescription: Its lightweight, non-greasy texture cushions the scalp while nourishing from root to tip for stronger, healthier hair. 100ml value size.
keyBenefits: Helps with hair thinning & hair fall
howToUse: Apply directly to the scalp and hair strands.
Leave on for at least 2 hours or overnight for deep nourishment.

customerReviews.featuredReview: It really lives up to its name, my scalp feels nourished and my hair fall reduced in just 2 weeks!

products.name: Deep Cleanse Centella Moroccan Red Clay Mask
products.shortDescription: A deep cleanse mask that purifies, soothes, and restores skin clarity with Moroccan Red Clay, Centella Asiatica, Allantoin, and Niacinamide.
products.detailedDescription: Its smooth, creamy texture spreads easily without over-drying, helping remove tan, calm irritation, and brighten the skin.
keyBenefits: Deeply cleanses clogged pores and blackheads
Helps remove tan and brightens skin
howToUse: Apply an even layer to clean, dry skin.
Avoid the eye and lip area.

products.name: Collagen + Neroli Hydrating Toner
products.shortDescription: A hydrating toner with Collagen, Neroli, Vitamin B-12, and Allantoin that purifies pores, tightens skin, and restores balance.
products.detailedDescription: This lightweight watery mist instantly refreshes while defending against pollution and preparing the skin for better serum absorption.
keyBenefits: Minimizes enlarged pores and evens texture
Defends against pollution and blue light
howToUse: After cleansing, spray directly onto face or on a cotton pad.
Can also be used as a mist throughout the day.
idealFor: Pollution and blue light exposed skin

customerReviews.featuredReview: This toner feels like a burst of hydration! My skin instantly feels cool, calm, and soft, love using it right after a long day.
commonPraise: My skin texture improved so much
Pores look visibly smaller within a week
